full_title: I Don't Wanna Lose Your Love by Santana (Ft. Los Lonely Boys)
title: I Don’t Wanna Lose Your Love
title_with_featured: I Don't Wanna Lose Your Love (Ft. Los Lonely Boys)
lyrics:
2 ContributorsI Don’t Wanna Lose Your Love LyricsIf you don't love me, baby
Let me know
'Cause you're breaking my heart
And it hurts me so

Playin' these games
And messin' with my mind
Girl, you made me believe
You were only mine

I don't wanna lose your love, oh
I guess I have to let you go
I don't wanna watch you leave, oh
I guess I have to walk away

Girl, you said you loved me
And you'd never go
You were lyin' to me
You thought I'd never know

I just wanna tell you
Girl, before I go
Take a good look at me
I won't be back no more

I don't wanna lose your love, oh
I guess I have to let you go
I don't wanna watch you leave, oh
I guess I have to walk away
